Module org.example.proyecto
Package org.example.proyecto.model.booking

Interface BookingDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookingDB
public interface BookingDAO
Interface for Booking Data Access Object (DAO). Provides methods for accessing and manipulating booking data in the database.
Since:
2024-05-28

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    deleteBooking(BookingDTO deletedBooking)
    Deletes a booking from the database based on its ID.
    List<BookingDTO>
    getBookings()
    Retrieves a list of all bookings from the database.
    boolean
    insertBooking(BookingDTO newBooking)
    Inserts a new booking into the database.
    boolean
    updateBooking(BookingDTO updatedBooking)
    Updates the details of an existing booking in the database.

  • Method Details

    • getBookings

      List<BookingDTO> getBookings() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all bookings from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of BookingDTO representing all bookings.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • insertBooking

      boolean insertBooking(BookingDTO newBooking) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new booking into the database.
      Parameters:
      newBooking - a BookingDTO object containing the new booking details.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully inserted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteBooking

      boolean deleteBooking(BookingDTO deletedBooking) throws SQLException
      Deletes a booking from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      deletedBooking - a BookingDTO object containing the ID of the booking to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • updateBooking

      boolean updateBooking(BookingDTO updatedBooking) throws SQLException
      Updates the details of an existing booking in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedBooking - a BookingDTO object containing the updated booking details.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully updated, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
